note.p: Daughter of Francis and Martha Duncombe. Married William Chatfield in Kensington, Middlesex, in 1818. Her daughter, Mary, married Charles Wentworth Dilke in 1840.
London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 August 2019)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 August 2019)
